reviewContent: okay. 1: the meals are disgusting!!! 2: the kids are pretty retarded 3: to many bullies!! 4: the teachers don't care at all 5: 5th graders get only 1 break per day! but I've learned a lot. I'm a quiet unnoticeable kid. so it's easy to avoided these "issues" it's a nice school in all but it has some problems....
